page.title: 08Scottish Youth Hostel Assoc.
page.content: The{Youth Hostel}is used mostly by climbers,hikers,geologists,& tourists in summer & parts of winter.It opens {5th Mar-1st Nov,2nd Dec-4th Jan.}Busy times are Easter,July Aug.Whitsun,New Year.It can take 82 people.It is used at times for community purposes like the winter craft class,and houses the mountain rescue. Dormitories are named after local places.They are small,some four bed,some family rooms.The hostel is a{grade one hostel,}which means it is one of the best type with modern fascilities;it does not provide meals. Apart from Scottish people,there are visitors from England,Europe,America & Australsia as well as from the East. The present building opened on 5th Aug 1975.It is a series of single storey buildings connected by corridors;it nestles at the foot of the mountain.It won award from{APRS}for archetecture.
